title.new: IGNITION_CMAKE_VERSION_MAJOR changes after finding packages that use newer version of ign-cmake
title.old: Support different versions of cmake for a workspace with different versions in ignition packages

issue.title: IGNITION_CMAKE_VERSION_MAJOR changes after finding packages that use newer version of ign-cmake

message.raw: This causes a package that ostensibly uses `ignition-cmake1` to export a dependency on `ignition-cmake2` in its cmake config files if it uses anything that depends on `ignition-cmake2`, as the example of `ign-transport5` with that `ign-msgs` branch shows.
message.html: This causes a package that ostensibly uses ignition-cmake1 to export a dependency on ignition-cmake2 in its cmake config files if it uses anything that depends on ignition-cmake2, as the example of ign-transport5 with that ign-msgs branch shows.
